Articles.Content:
**Ghostbuzzer7's RenderFarm**

**Render of the Week**

**SpaceX CRS-8 Landing**

![7n0xLww.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7n0xLww.jpg)

**Why another Render Farm?**

**Due to this new addon in which allows me to import any .craft files into blender, I have started to render images myself and now I want to open it to you. So I want to make this render farm because Starwhip inspired me to do so and two its something that makes me happy.**

**What are my rendering options?**

**Based on my computer, I offer 1920 x 1080 \*Standard\*, 3000 x 4000 \*Ultra Portrait layout\*, and 7680 x 4320 \*Only for special people\*.** 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Oj5mN)

**I offer a three different types of rendering: 50 - 100 samples in which can have a grainy look typically 5 minute render. Then a 300 - 500 sample render in which looks great for amateur pics hardly almost little grainy, about 30 minutes to an hour. Next 1000 sample render, typically 2 to 5 hour render depending on layout option, complete polish, no grain, professional. Note\* You must show camera angle at which you want the rendering to be via screenshot.**

**What do you do with the renderings?**

**After I finish the renderings, they go under the fun process whereas I creatively remake it to look even more superior than it already is. Using an image editing software called GIMP, I am able to produce astounding results in less than 30 minutes. Depending on your rendering options your image should arrive by the next day.**

**How do I get started?**

**Simply specify your rendering options as listed above and give me the download link to your favorite craft. Then wait for your finished product to arrive.** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Render List:**

**1.**

**2.**

**3.**

**4.**

**5.**

**Render Que \*If necessary\***

**1.**

**2.**

**3.**

**4.**

**5.**

**My work done for others:**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/fIivI)

**Cant wait to get started** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T19:50:24Z" title="07/17/2015 07:50  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by ghostbuzzer7**

Any chance you could do my [space shark](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114754-Space-Shark?)? Here is a pic with a nice angle:

![p97g9PA.png](http://i.imgur.com/p97g9PA.png)

Thanks in advance!
Got it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). I will start right now, Since I got nothing else to do.

**Your call, I made two; one of them for the fun and the other for regular at 500 samples 1920 x 1080P** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> ![FtfmATj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/FtfmATj.jpg)
> 
> ![gLZ3onB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/gLZ3onB.jpg)
> 
> 

Next please ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Wow, this is really awesome! Gonna use this as Desktop background. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you so much!

So we've got [Esinohio's Blender Farm](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93628-Esinohio-s-Blender-farm-%28Requests-Welcome%29)

Mine (Which, hopefully, I can get back to very soon): [Starwhip's Renderfarm](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111633-Starwhip-s-Renderfarm-OFF-DUTY)

And now your "Blender RenderFarm"...

Nope, no name stealing. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Looking good so far!

As all of the workers at the Kerbal Space Center await the arrival of the Jumbo Jet carrying over 73 newly hired kerbalnauts. The prominent F-35 Metalstorm VTOL escorts it to the landing pad while keeping keen eye for any trespassing foreign aircrafts. You can find the full image here: [http://i.imgur.com/GFZwkkG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/GFZwkkG.jpg)

\*Render Details: 4K Resolution, Samples: 1500, Blender 3D, Took 3 hours, Editted with gimp\*

> 
> ![GFZwkkG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/GFZwkkG.jpg)
>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-21T20:31:39Z" title="05/21/2015 08:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 21, 2015</time> by ghostbuzzer7**

Eeehhhh, I'm not a fan of the distortion effect.

I like the positioning and such. How'd you get it working, are these old files?
How did you get two craft into one render? 0\_o

> 
> How did you get two craft into one render? 0\_o

Probably by importing another craft into the scene. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Precisely Starwhip. Imported another craft. No photoshop or gimp required for that. I got the addon to work so Im ready for any submissions if there are any I will be glad to do them.

After the event of CRS-7, NASA cancelled CRS-8 until further research as to what was the problem with that launch. Upon given the green light to launch, Elon Musk optimistically watch as the CRS-8 soar up to the upper atmosphere. As the first stage booster decoupled releasing the dragon capsule, the world watched to see CRS-8 computer guided program begin performing its "suicide burn" directly over the barge. Later on that day, SpaceX became the first to successfully land a booster stage back to Earth. SpaceX surely left the world in shock to see a 14 story tall booster stage sitting on a barge.

Note: Big thanks to [esinohio](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/59393-esinohio) for assisting me in developing these flames. Toss him a rep too and check out his renderfarm [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93628-Esinohio-s-Blender-farm).
